about_the_game:
AN ASTEROID-BLASTING BATTLE ROYALE!
Inspired by classic asteroid arcade shooters, Moonrock Miners meshes the skill-based combat of the modern battle royale, with the precision shooting and evasion of classic asteroid gameplay.

  • Warp in to an asteroid filled planetary orbit with 50 other pilots, and compete to be the last survivor!
  • Increase your ship's health by collecting gems mined by shooting the Asteroids!
  • Collect Power Pills for a temporary advantage!
  • Blast your enemies with your lasers, or BUMP them out of the ring!
detailed_description:
AN ASTEROID-BLASTING BATTLE ROYALE!
Inspired by classic asteroid arcade shooters, Moonrock Miners meshes the skill-based combat of the modern battle royale, with the precision shooting and evasion of classic asteroid gameplay.

  • Warp in to an asteroid filled planetary orbit with 50 other pilots, and compete to be the last survivor!
  • Increase your ship's health by collecting gems mined by shooting the Asteroids!
  • Collect Power Pills for a temporary advantage!
  • Blast your enemies with your lasers, or BUMP them out of the ring!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: Moonrock Miners

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ (or later)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires OpenGL 3.3 or later
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: MOONROCK MINERS is an online multiplayer battle royale where players collect Crystals and blast each other to be the last ship alive!
